description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

5 John Spencer Square, Islington, London, N1 2LZ

TPO Reference:

T6 – Lime of LBI TPO (No.309) 2007  indicated as T2 on the plan provided
T7 & T8 – Limes of LBI TPO (No.309) 2007  indicated as TG3 on the plan provided

PO Number:

T100027

Work specifications:

3 x Limes (T6, T7 &T8) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.309) 2007
Crown reduce by up to 35% to the last previous points of reduction.
decision_conditions:
While approval has been granted for the crown reduction of these trees, this does not imply that the council have received the level of evidence to implicate these trees either partially or wholly as contributing factors to the alleged subsidence damage at 4 John Spencer Square. These trees have historically been pruned at these points and the repeat of those works previously approved should not be detrimental to the long term health or the form of the trees.
The continued level monitoring is expected to establish any reaction to the pruning works but it is strongly recommended that the ivy on trees and the other significant shrubby vegetation in the area be removed as this leaf area will have a major affect on the vegetative water uptake in the immediate location of the damage and its removal is preferable to the loss of valuable amenity trees.
